participant_1.background:
I lost my beloved dog when I was away on business.
i have a younger sibling.
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i love my work and just got promoted.
i live on a boat.

participant_2.background:
I am a caring individual who wants to help others, but I am afraid that I will not be able to live up to my own expectations.
i love the tigers baseball team.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets.
my grandparents are dead.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
I'm an artist, I create with my mind and my hands.
That's awesome! I'm a cosplayer, I love creating costumes and being someone else for a day.
That sounds like so much fun! I've always wanted to be a cosplayer.
You should try it! It's a great way to express yourself and make new friends.
I know I should, but I'm always so busy with work.
You could always make time for something you love, right?
I guess you're right. Maybe I'll start with a small project and see how it goes.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks for the encouragement! I appreciate it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help out a fellow artist.
